column4: There is no use posting a problem here I supose, sould I (and others) go and post it on the ubuntu forum instead?
CHECKING the forums befor you come here is always a good idea.
proberly most every problem i see in here on a given day. has been discussed  in  one of more forum posts as well
I have checked the forum for a solution for my problem but I didn't find it, my next step was to go here for live aid but it seems futile when it's packed like this... :)
